snippet: The search engine phrases that lead readers to Wife and War, a blog, show that veterans and spouses are alone and searching for support online. Wounded by war, they end up isolated, sitting in front of a computer and searching for support. On At War,...
abstract: The search engine phrases that lead readers to Wife and War, a blog, show that veterans and spouses are alone and searching for support online. Wounded by war, they end up isolated, sitting in front of a computer and searching for support. On At War, Amalie Flynn, writes about the struggles she imagines when see the search engine phrases people use.

headline.main: Search Engines Log the Fearsome Journeys of War Families
